summary:
GitHub: https://github.com/EvertonSA

Experienced Information Technology Analyst with a demonstrated professional background of working in the information technology and services industry, such as automobile, insurance, payment solutions, manufacturing, etc. 

Production experience on Azure, GCP, AWS (Amazon Web Services) and tools like  Docker, Python (Flask and Gunicorn), Java (Springboot and Kotlin), NodeJS (Typescript), Ansible, PostgreSQL, Linux, and Data Analytics among others. Have experience with monitoring tools such as Elasticsearch, Kibana, FluentD, Prometheus, Thanos, Cortex, Grafana, Splunk, Datadog, AppDynamics and New Relic. Also, experience with container orchestration with Kubernetes and Rancher.

awards.title: Silver Medal in Public School Physics Olympics

projects.title: Multicloud consulting
projects.description: Worked as a consulting in an application architecture migration from monolithic to multicloud microservice developed in React.js and Node.js. The original application was a Java-based application written with the Play Framework. The challenges were to combine the Sales Force integration with the multicloud request from the customer.

contributors.headline: Senior Solutions Architect at Amazon Web Services (AWS)

profile_positions.description:
- locust performance testing
- proxy and webserver tunning
- database tunning
- infrastructure provisioning, scaling and monitoring
- kubernetes tunning
- application performance management and logging
- PKI infrastructure, tls and mtls
- API gateway tunning and version controlled
- Python (webserver and scripting)
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer - Application Performance Tunning and Stress Test

profile_positions.description: As the only engineer with SRE experience, I manage dozens of hosts and hundred of workloads on a Kubernetes Cluster. I'm responsible to assure the SLO's are as expected and whenever something goes wrong, and I am also dedicated to Incident Response.
profile_positions.title: Site Reliability Engineer (AWS/GCP)

profile_positions.description:
While Shipay was a small startup, having everything packed together and deployed once a week/month manually was not a problem.

When we finally reach the status of a company (legally), we needed a strong and empowered pipeline to test and deploy our python backend microservices.

I was responsible for building a scalable, affordable, secure, modern, and robust pipeline system using the git-flow versioning model. We chose for open-source tech stack and aimed to make zero impact on the current versioning process.

The scalable part of the pipeline is guaranteed by Kubernetes and the robustness is guaranteed by Harness opensource solutions.
profile_positions.title: DevOps Lead

profile_positions.description:
- Managed day-to-day job of DevOps and QA colleagues (3 employees).
- Approve architectural changes and new feature requests.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineering Manager

profile_positions.description:
As partnerships with Shipay were evolving, our main tech lead had to work full time on a partner system. I had the opportunity to technically lead the onboarding team. We had a huge challenge to come up with a scalable landing pages solution and certificate management for our TLS gateway.

It was an interesting month, lot's of requirements, a lot of work! We managed around 4 microservices from development to production to provide customers easy onboarding process. Again, Kubernetes was responsible for providing the team the scalability we need for onboarding microservices. Most of the solution was based on the SAGA pattern with REST API.
profile_positions.title: Onboarding Backend Techlead

profile_positions.description:
"O dinheiro cai em 1 dia útil no saldo da sua conta iti e você pode transferir, sacar, pagar contas, recarregar o celular e muito mais. Tudo sem taxa!" "com iti, dá pra pagar seus amigos usando o cartão de crédito eles recebem a transferência na hora com o iti, e você só paga na fatura! é rápido e sem taxas ;)". 

Para não descumprir com minhas obrigações de preservar ao máximo o sigilo de arquitetura de produtos e soluções, listo aqui o que é de domínio público sobre o iti. Atuei como SRE em uma squad a lá CRE rampando seus primeiros esforços em torno da matéria. Éramos compostos por 8 colegas com KPI agressivos de confiabilidade de software e tratamento de incidentes. Atuei em funcionalidades maneiríssimas para o produto como saque digital, recarga, pagamento de boletos bancários e etc. As tecnologias públicas são: AWS (mais variados serviços), EKS Kubernetes, Istio Service Mesh, Jaegger, Elasticseach, Fluentd, Kibana, Grafana, Prometheus. Na cloud privada, e de dominio público, atuavamos em ferramentas como Splunk, AppDynamics e Prometheus/Grafana. Linguagens de programação/frameworks que tive contato foram Kotlin, Spring MVC, Springboot, Dotnet Core e Python. Bastante  Terraform!
profile_positions.title: Site Reliability Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Work with major executive jets producer company in the country and top player in the world ranking. The solution was build from the ground up. The major tasks in this project were to be a native communicator between developers, architects, Scrum Master and Product Owner. With intense experience in critical business scenarios, the role I took was to unite the team and provide all tools necessary for Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment. 

Technologies used: Private Google Kubernetes Engine clusters, Google CloudSQL, BigTable, GCP IAM, Stackdriver (Logging and Monitoring), Istio Open Source, GCP Endpoints, Kong, Google Cloud Storage, Nginx Ingress controllers, Jenkins, Terraform for IaC, Python, Bash, Helm for templating, GitOps, GitFlow, Node.js Typescript, and other native GCP products.
profile_positions.title: DevOps Consultant at Embraer

profile_positions.description:
Worked together with developers and CRM analysts to integrate in-house Kotlin application hosted on AWS to Salesforce products. The job also involved applying communication strategies in order to envolve the team's overall observability. Technologies:
Kotlin; Python 3.6; AWS products (ECS, SQS, RDS, Lambda); Kibana for logging observability; Datadog for APM; Salesforce products(...) API via REST and via Bulk.
profile_positions.title: System Integration Specialist at Guiabolso

profile_positions.description:
As a contribution to the company development lifecycle, it was inevitable that someone needed to abstract the complicated Kubernetes first deep dive before people could adopt as the defacto Container Orchestrator of the century. The role I was assigned involved architecting a Kubernetes on Google Cloud Platform with monitoring, logging, and continuous integration and delivery solution in matters of just executing one script. 

The cluster components and technologies that were used are listed below:
Google Cloud Platform, Kubernetes, Istio, Helm, Cert-Manager, Prometheus, Grafana, Prometheus exporters, Alert Manager, Elasticsearch, Kibana, Fluentd, Harbor for Container Registry, Jenkins for Code checkout and Docker build, Sonarqube for Code Analysis.
profile_positions.title: Kubernetes Bootstrapper on GKE

profile_positions.description:
As part of the HR hiring activities, there was a need to have intense training of 10 days on the topic "DevOps Culture" for the Sciensa Trainee 2019 Program. The activities involved were: preparing teaching material and methodology for knowledge transfer, lecturing for over 7 days on topics listed below.

Topics: Linux basics commands, Linux basic debugging, Docker (container understanding, commands to build, run, debug, kill containers, and Dockerfile best practices), Docker-compose, Cloud Computing on Google Cloud Platform (network, storage and workload in VM instances and in Google Kubernetes Engine), Kubernetes (overall architecture, basic objects and cluster operation).
profile_positions.title: Tutor of Trainee Program

profile_positions.description:
Work directly with major insurance company to maintain the main product of the company. As an DevOps with SRE experience, I introduced the team to the culture of Post-Mortems with high quality incident analysis in production environments.  As part of my job, I have to improve the system to deliver a great solution to the final customer.
Technologies used: Docker, Rancher, AWS EC2, AWS Route53, AWS S3, Kong API Gateway, Grafana, Prometheus, FluentD, Elasticsearch Kibana. Programming languages on the project are React.js and Java Spring. Although I'm not responsible for developing, I have already done maintenance on the code to improve Dockerization and Logging.
profile_positions.title: DevOps Engineer Insurence Company

profile_positions.description:
Maintenance of Cloud Environment for a Software as a Service product offered by T-Systems; Offshore team member, with german colleagues leading the development of a Cloud Environment offering CAX applications as a Service; Creation of reports and documentation in English; Linux/Windows operation directed to recently provisioned virtual machines on the Public Cloud product offered by T-Systems International, the Open Telekom Cloud; 
Tools: NginX, Ansible, Node.js, CentOS, Windows Server 2016, CAX Applications, OTC, Confluence, Jyra, WebEx, Bash scripting, PowerShell scripting, Git, SmartCard authentication, command line tools on Linux (vi, grep, curl, ssh, sed, open-ssl, etc).
profile_positions.title: Cloud Development Analyst II

profile_positions.description: Support of Manufacturing Execution System, developed by Dassault Systèmes, by analyzing machine operations and business logic in general to improve performance, correcting bugs on the application and customer problem solving on a highly time pressured manufacturing systems on an automobile factory. Tools: Dassault Apriso, C#, SQL Server, Microsoft Windows Server 2012, MSTSC, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Process Builder, Automation Simulator (Keep Server), PowerShell Scripting.
profile_positions.title: Manunfacturing Execution System Analyst

profile_positions.description: The project, produced under the School of Media and Communication Brazil Internship Program, involved 100 students finding elements of their home country in Melbourne. Students focused on developing business and creative skills including professional writing, web development, photo-imaging, networking and pitching, social media for business, and communication across different cultures.
profile_positions.title: Trainee

volunteer_experiences.role: Teacher computer skills to senior citizens
volunteer_experiences.description:
Elders computer teacher
Salvation Army, Melbourne, VIC. January, 2015 - April, 2015

Assisting elders in the public housing of Victoria to use technology in order to improve social interactions. Creating  small  social projects to introduce nowadays technology, like Email, Netbank and social media to the seniors of the public housing.

Auxílio aos idosos da Conferência São Vicente de Paula com o primeiro contato deles com computadores, celulares e outras tecnologias. O projeto envolveu a comunidade em torno do asilo para que terapias fossem aliadas a tecnologias, com foco nos moradores da Conferência São Vicente de Paula.
